amount: The transaction fee to pay, in bitcoins, for each kilobyte of transaction data. Be careful setting the fee too low—your transactions may not be relayed or included in blocks.
field1: put in helpful info for field1
help:
The settxfee RPC sets the transaction fee per kilobyte paid by transactions created by this wallet. 

 Parameter #1—the transaction fee amount per kilobyte. 

 Result: true on success.
